timeline.headline: Arvind Kejriwal in recent times
timeline.text: Arvind Kejriwal is not the Chief Minister of Delhi and he has been acting a bit wierd lately. Some recent developments since he became CM

date.headline: FDI in retail would add to widespread unemployment: Arvind Kejriwal
date.text: "The small Indian store owners will lose business if FDI in retail implemented. The businessmen and the industrialists of nation give jobs," Kejriwal told reporters here today. Slamming the Congress-led Union Government on FDI, Kejriwal said, "They have made banana republic of the country. In a major policy reversal, the Aam Aadmi Party Government had yester .. more ..

date.headline: Claiming Delhi needs jobs, Kejriwal scraps nod to FDI in retail
date.text: Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal said the decision was taken to address the huge problem of unemployment in Delhi and that it had been communicated to the Union commerce and industries ministry through a letter on January 1. Those which had accepted they will allow FDI under multi-brand retail had signed a legal agreement with us, based on which we had issued .. more ..

date.headline: CM Arvind Kejriwal invokes Wal-Mart, Tesco, axes Sheila Dikshit nod to FDI in multi-brand retail in Delhi
date.text: In a major policy reversal, Arvind Kejriwal's Aam Aadmi Party government today withdrew the approval given by the previous Sheila Dikshit dispensation for FDI in multi-brand retail in Delhi, saying allowing global retail chains like Wal-Mart and Tesco to set up shops will result in large-scale job losses. It had even announced plan to make amendments to the .. more ..
